languages.text: "Не страшись меня, законодержец. Не оплошай в сражении, и справедливый гнев мой не падет на тебя".

traits.locale_text: "Не страшись меня, законодержец. Не оплошай в сражении, и справедливый гнев мой не падет на тебя".

languages.text: "Do not be frightened, lawkeeper. Fight well, and my righteous anger will not fall upon you."
languages.original_text: "Не страшись меня, законодержец. Не оплошай в сражении, и справедливый гнев мой не падет на тебя".

traits.locale_text: "Do not be frightened, lawkeeper. Fight well, and my righteous anger will not fall upon you."
"Do not be frightened, lawkeeper. Fight well, and my righteous anger will not fall upon you."
"Do not be frightened, lawkeeper. Fight well, and my righteous anger will not fall upon you."
"Do not be frightened, lawkeeper. Fight well, and my righteous anger will not fall upon you."
"Do not be frightened, lawkeeper. Fight well, and my righteous anger will not fall upon you."
"Do not be frightened, lawkeeper. Fight well, and my righteous anger will not fall upon you."

languages.text: 「恐れるな、法の番人よ。正しく戦うならば、俺の義憤がお前に向けられることはない」
languages.original_text: "Do not be frightened, lawkeeper. Fight well, and my righteous anger will not fall upon you."

traits.locale_text: 「恐れるな、法の番人よ。正しく戦うならば、俺の義憤がお前に向けられることはない」

languages.text: "Seid unbesorgt, Gesetzeshüter. Kämpft gut, dann wird mein rechtschaffener Zorn Euch nicht treffen."
languages.original_text: "Do not be frightened, lawkeeper. Fight well, and my righteous anger will not fall upon you."

traits.locale_text: "Seid unbesorgt, Gesetzeshüter. Kämpft gut, dann wird mein rechtschaffener Zorn Euch nicht treffen."

languages.text: « N'ayez crainte, gardien de la loi. Tant que vous combattrez bravement, ma juste colère ne s'abattra pas sur vous. »
languages.original_text: "Do not be frightened, lawkeeper. Fight well, and my righteous anger will not fall upon you."

traits.locale_text: « N'ayez crainte, gardien de la loi. Tant que vous combattrez bravement, ma juste colère ne s'abattra pas sur vous. »

languages.text: «No tema, legislador. Luche bien, y mi furia virtuosa no caerá sobre usted».
languages.original_text: "Do not be frightened, lawkeeper. Fight well, and my righteous anger will not fall upon you."

traits.locale_text: «No tema, legislador. Luche bien, y mi furia virtuosa no caerá sobre usted».

languages.text: “不必惧怕，执法者。只要你好好战斗，我的正义之怒就不会落在你的头上。”
languages.original_text: "Do not be frightened, lawkeeper. Fight well, and my righteous anger will not fall upon you."

traits.locale_text: “不必惧怕，执法者。只要你好好战斗，我的正义之怒就不会落在你的头上。”

languages.text: "Korkuya mahal yok kanun koruyucu. İyi savaşırsan öfkemden nasibini almazsın."
languages.original_text: "Do not be frightened, lawkeeper. Fight well, and my righteous anger will not fall upon you."

traits.locale_text: "Korkuya mahal yok kanun koruyucu. İyi savaşırsan öfkemden nasibini almazsın."

languages.original_text: "Do not be frightened, lawkeeper. Fight well, and my righteous anger will not fall upon you."
